attributes.action: halt any attempt to allow tony blair to become the UK candidate for, or the actual President of the European Council.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Blair is a proven liar, a war-mongering and, possibly, given the recent request by doctors for a new inquiry into the death of Dr Kelley, a man who authorised assassination.

He wavers, has no firm commitments to anything other than his income, prevaricates and lead the world into an economic meltdown; he cannot even remain true to his faith.

It would be a travesty if this man ever held a public office again.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
